data.author: App Holdings
data.description:
Pebble Rocker aims to be the ultimate Pebble watch companion for Android users.

Included Watch Apps: Android Settings, Chopper Game, Camera Control, Facebook Feed, Foursquare Checkin, Twitter Feed, Events, Photos, Tip Calculator,  and Phone Pager.

See Google Play listing for full details (scroll up and tap "Get" at top of listing).
data.title: Rocker for Pebble

data.author: Map My Tracks
data.description: Start every run with Running OutFront from Map My Tracks. OutFront keeps track of your runs and let you track your progress live . Map My Tracks OutFront uses Pebble’s built-in sports app.
data.title: Running - Map My Tracks OutFront

data.author: Map My Tracks
data.description: Start every bike ride with Map My Tracks OutFront. OutFront keeps track of bike rides and let you track your progress live . Map My Tracks OutFront uses Pebble’s built-in sports app.
data.title: Cycling - Map My Tracks OutFront

data.author: Samuel Mathieson
data.description: Remote control for Android OS from your Pebble. Works with intents on the Android platform and thus is very flexible. Android app is free and without ads.
data.title: Pebble Remote

data.author: 2Biscuits
data.description: Android application to take photos from your phone's gallery or camera (or any other photo source !!)  and have them display on your Pebble watch
data.title: Rockface

data.author: KixAss
data.description:
App to control your Essent E-Thermostaat (thermostat) via your Pebble. Uses Pebble version 2.0 and configures via Pebble app.

Feel free to donate:
- PayPal: http://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_donations&business=erik%40csw%2enl&lc
data.title: E-ThermoPebble

data.author: Steve Penna
data.description:
Design and share dynamic watch-faces on your Android phone

- Drag/drop watch-face design, with animation
- Add dynamic content (weather, phone battery, missed called, etc) 
- Include world-time from any timezone
data.title: Canvas for Pebble

data.author: Christoph

changelog.release_notes:
Fixed some minor issues:
 - Brushtime is now fixed to a 30s grid
 - Sandglass is not empty when for the first second after start
Build with latest Pebble SDK 3.0 (dp2)
2.0.1 - BugFix: Brushtime could get over 9:59 via Up-Clicks

data.description:
Basically a digital version of the little sandglass I had when I was a kid to ensure I'm toothbrushing a proper amount of time.
http://christophhaefner.de/pebble/

latest_release.release_notes:
Fixed some minor issues:
 - Brushtime is now fixed to a 30s grid
 - Sandglass is not empty when for the first second after start
Build with latest Pebble SDK 3.0 (dp2)

data.title: Toothbrushtimer

data.author: Neal Patel
data.description:
This app has been merged with Skipstone and is no longer maintained. Please use Skipstone instead.

---------

A remote control watch app for VLC Media Player which allows you to toggle play/pause, change volume, seek, and get recent status of what's playing and how far you've watched - all right on your wrist!

It uses VLC's native web interface API to communicate.
data.title: VLC Remote

data.author: Joe Masilotti

changelog.release_notes:
No more companion app required! This app talks to your phone via JavaScript so you don't have to worry about launching the app on your phone first. It also means you can use it on Android.

This release also adds support for London's Barclays Cycle Hire.

Huge thanks to Tomas Vitek for helping out with the JavaScript. http://tomasvitek.com

v1.0.2

Initial Pebble App Store release.

data.description: A simple, open-source app to show the nearest available bike share dock or bike on your Pebble. New York City's CitiBike and London's Barclays Cycle Hire are currently supported.

latest_release.release_notes:
No more companion app required! This app talks to your phone via JavaScript so you don't have to worry about launching the app on your phone first. It also means you can use it on Android.

This release also adds support for London's Barclays Cycle Hire.

Huge thanks to Tomas Vitek for helping out with the JavaScript. http://tomasvitek.com

data.title: PebCiti - NYC CitiBike and London Barclays Cycle Hire

data.author: Dsexton702
data.description:
Now have the all the answers to your questions with the flick of a wrist!

This app is based off of the magic 8 ball.

Contains 20 different answers.
data.title: mAGIC8(accelerometer)

data.author: #21Zoo Labs

changelog.release_notes:
Initial release 
- no companion app needed
- live scores on your pebble
- up/down to scroll
- "select" to toggle between regular and post season

data.description: Get football scores in realtime on your Pebble, never again miss what's going on.

latest_release.release_notes:
Initial release 
- no companion app needed
- live scores on your pebble
- up/down to scroll
- "select" to toggle between regular and post season

data.title: American Football Scores

data.author: Javier Mora

changelog.release_notes:
release 1.0:
- Supports BIXI Toronto.
- Displays nearby bike/dock availability and station distance to the user.
(Indie Developer, no affiliation with BIXI)

data.description:
Note: Only BIXI Toronto supported. Indie Developer is not affiliated with BIXI. 

Do you want to figure out where is the closest bike sharing station and how many bikes and docks are left? This Watchapp will list nearby bike sharing stations and their availability information. 

Press Up / Down buttons to list other stations, sorted by distance to you. Press Select button to re-calculate info.

latest_release.release_notes:
release 1.0:
- Supports BIXI Toronto.
- Displays nearby bike/dock availability and station distance to the user.
(Indie Developer, no affiliation with BIXI)

data.title: Bike Watcher

data.author: Allan175

changelog.release_notes:
Added high score feature.
Added increasing difficulty levels.

data.description:
Updated version of Pebble Robots, now includes a high score showing the highest level achieved.

Now starts easy and gets harder!

latest_release.release_notes:
Added high score feature.
Added increasing difficulty levels.

data.title: Robots 2

data.author: Aeropilot

changelog.release_notes: Press center button to add dives and surface time, delete last entry and reset app.

data.description:
A simple dive planning reference tool. Based on PADI Recreational Dive Planner tables. This is the imperial version, there is a metric version available.

Don't use this tool for actual dive planning, use it for reference only!

latest_release.release_notes: Press center button to add dives and surface time, delete last entry and reset app.

data.title: AeroDiver Imperial

data.author: Aeropilot

changelog.release_notes: Press center button to add dives and surface time, delete last entry and reset app.

data.description:
A simple dive planning reference tool. Based on PADI Recreational Dive Planner tables. This is the metric version, there is an imperial version available.

Don't use this tool for actual dive planning, use for reference only!

latest_release.release_notes: Press center button to add dives and surface time, delete last entry and reset app.

data.author: Chris Lewis

changelog.release_notes:
v3.3:
- Migrate to new server config.

v3.2
- Add app icon
- Build for Diorite (Pebble 2)
- Improve settings screen
- Improve layout

v3.1:
- Design updates.
- Timeline pins for delays all platforms.

v3.0:
- New design for Aplite, Basalt, and Chalk

data.description: See the line status of the London Underground from your wrist! Unofficial app using the TfL Unified API.
data.title: Tube Status

data.author: Nick Fajardo

changelog.release_notes: Support for SDK2 (local storage of score)

data.description:
Keep track of 2 player's scores with this app on your watch.  

Scores are saved to the watch when switching apps

Select button (middle click) to select which counter is being toggled.
Hold down Select to clear both counters.

latest_release.release_notes: Support for SDK2 (local storage of score)

data.title: Dual Scorekeeper

data.author: Peter Baylies
data.description: A simple 4-function calculator for your wrist.
data.title: Calculator

data.author: Iñigo Chueca
data.description:
- Define and manage in watch Reminders (one-shot and repeating) and Quick Alarms
- Review notifications on watch 
- View Calendar and events
- View phone settings (WiFi, Mobile Data, GPS, Sound, Volume level and Battery) and manage some of them (Wifi, Sound and Volume)
- Find your phone making it sound and take remote photos
- Manage remote PC apps 
- See forums on help
data.title: Pebble Notifications & Reminders
